  • How to fix the OpenVPN client issue in El Capitan

    10 Apr 2016

    With El Capitan, Apple introduced a new security feature: System Integrity Protection, preventing admin users from modifying many system files and directories. That new feature can also prevent you from using the OpenVPN client, therefore if you're getting an error like this: You'll need to disable System Integrity Protection using...
